original: Kärrby, Thorild Emanuel, kyrkoherde, Göteborg, f. 4/9/87 i Gbg. G. 23 m. Karin Christenson. Barn: Göran f. 29, Kurt 30. ~ Mog:ex. i Gbg 08, teol. fil. ex. 10, teol. kand., prakt, teol. prov samt präst v. f. Gbgs stift 16. Tjg. som v. pastor i Sätila o. Ör-gryte, v. komniin. i Gälistad o. Seglo-ra, kyrkoadj. i Partilie o. Oscar Fredriks förs. i Gbg samt pred. v. Förs :-hyddan i Gbg, kommin. i Örgryte 29-47, kyrkoh. där sed. 47. V. ordf. o. v. dirig. i Kyrkosångens vänners Gbgs-krets, led. av kyrkofullm. m. m.
translated: Kärrby, Thorild Emanuel, clergyman, Gothenburg, born on 4/9/1887 in Gothenburg. Married on 23/XX with Karin Christenson. Children: Göran, born in 1929, Kurt, born in 1930. Graduated from the Faculty of Theology in Gothenburg in 1908, obtained a Bachelor's degree in Theology in 1910, completed practical theological examinations and served as a priest in the Gothenburg diocese from 1916. Worked as a vicar in Sätila and Örgryte, vicar commissioner in Gälistad and Seglora, church assistant in Partille and Oscar Fredrik's congregation in Gothenburg, and preacher at the Förs:hyddan in Gothenburg. Became a vicar in Örgryte from 1929 to 1947, and has been a parish priest there since 1947. Holds the position of vice chairman and conductor in the Gothenburg section of the Church Song Friends. Also, a member of the church council, and more.

memberOf.name: Gothenburg section of the Church Song Friends
